description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission reference13F/2947 - (To erect a seven to eleven-storey building with landscaped courtyards, comprising 488 no. student bedrooms (within 48 no. self-contained studios and 83 no. cluster apartments) with ancillary student facilities, self-contained retail unit (Use Classes A1/A3/A4/A5) fronting London Road and three-floor basement car park for public parking, accessed from Lord Nelson Street) to allow for introduction of additional door onto Pudsey Street to serve the commercial unit.
site_address: 28 London Road, (Site of the former Odeon Cinema), Liverpool, L3 5NF
